name: Eliminate One
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2019.  Based on the theme "Only One", this top-down stealth game requires you to find and eliminate the one problematic guard before sneaking to the goal.

Music Credit:

Neo Western
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
